data.text: I praise Yahweh, who is like an overhanging rock under which I ◄get refuge/am protected►!
He is the one who protects me;
Yahweh, we people are very insignificant/unimportant, so why ◄are you concerned/do you care about us► [RHQ]?
The time that we live is as short as [SIM] a puff of wind;
Yahweh, ◄tear open/open up► the sky and come down!
Cause lightning to flash with the result that your enemies will run away!
It is as though my enemies surround me like a flood;
God, I will sing a new song to you,
You enable kings to defeat their enemies;
So I ask you to save me from being killed by the swords that those evil people carry.
I wish/hope that our young sons will grow up to be like strong plants [SIM],
I wish/hope that our barns will be full of many different crops.
I wish/hope that our cows will give birth to many calves
If good things like that happen to a nation,
